original_text: Just as you saw that the feet and toes were partly of baked clay and partly of iron, so this will be a divided kingdom; yet it will have some of the strength of iron in it, even as you saw iron mixed with clay.
korean_text: 왕께서 그 발과 발가락이 얼마는 토기장이의 진흙이요 얼마는 쇠인 것을 보셨은즉 그 나라가 나누일 것이며 왕께서 쇠와 진흙이 섞인 것을 보셨은즉 그 나라가 쇠 같은 든든함이 있을 것이나

sentences.original_text: Just as you saw that the feet and toes
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그 발가락과 발을 본 것처럼

sentences.original_text: so this will be a divided kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 이 나라도 나누일 것이나

sentences.original_text: yet it will have some of the strength of iron in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에는 쇠의 강함이 조금 있을 것이라

sentences.original_text: even as you saw iron mixed with clay
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 흙과 섞인 쇠를 본 것처럼
